PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-15762002-09-240,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I AND VI) by making it compulsory for multi-engine turbo-jet aeroplanes to be equipped with an Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) and by exempting aircraft conducting sport parachuting flights within 25 nautical miles of the point of departure from the requirement to be equipped with an ELT.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0345 Publication Date: 2002-10-09
Attachments
